english.segment1: Theres just no way out of this one. Look what I have got myself into. Why do I always seem to find trouble. And do what trouble would´ve me do
english.segment2: All this time I have tried to keep my. Life straight in line. All the while my life keeps falling apart. I wish that I could become. What my God had in mind. I guess what I am doin´ now. Makes me human
english.segment3: Thought I knew all that I had. Guess you never know till it is gone. Just one more thing for me to fix. Next time I know I will get it right
